item.description: A night of fashion, fitness, health & wellness, shopping, dancing and prizes. Psychic Readings, Henna & Glitter Tattoos, Photobooth, Demonstrations, NEW NIGHT SPA, NEW RELAXATION ROOM ... and so much more! THIS YEAR'S CHARITY: Each year, a portion of the night's proceeds to a local Connecticut charity. For 2012, it will be working with Dress For Sucess - Hartford Location. Buy your tickets now! http://www.aclearvisi... Right now you can get your tickets online for $10.49

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!
